title: Could we get information about what is released?

content.raw:
Today, I noticed the newer version SRCSim 0.5.0 is ready in apt-get. (I appreciated all your efforts!!)

However, it is very hard to check what is difference between version 0.4.0 and 0.5.0. There many branches and not-yet-merged commits in this repository.

Therefore, I think it would be nice if there are some short note in wiki like a "release note".
Is it possible?
